Package hirondelle.formula

The main items in the Formula4J API.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Decimal Represent an immutable number, using a natural, compact syntax.
Formula Evaluate a mathematical formula.
 

Exception Summary
MalformedFormulaException A formula doesn't have the proper syntax.
UnknownFunctionException A formula contains a function that's not defined.
UnpopulatedVariableException A formula contains a variable that hasn't been assigned a value.
 

Package hirondelle.formula Description

The main items in the Formula4J API.
